name: Louise en hiver
summary: Louise, an elderly woman, spends her summers in the seaside town of Billigen. When the last train of the season leaves without her, she realizes that she must survive the winter alone. As the tides rise it becomes clear that no one is looking for her, and Louise must adapt not only to the conditions, but also to the solitude. She sets up camp on the shore and finds the companion of an old dog, also forgotten.
